addVerifier(address).details: Verifier can add master address or remove addresses added by it

params._linkedAddress: address which is to be linked

initialize(address,uint256).details: Contract follows proxy pattern and this function is used to initialize the variables for the contract in the proxy

params._activationDelay: Delay in seconds after which addresses are registered or linked
params._admin: Admin of the verification contract who can add verifiers and remove masterAddresses deemed invalid

params._user: address which has to be checked if mapped against a verified master address
params._verifier: verifier with which master address has to be verified

returns._0: if the user is linke dto a registered master address

linkAddress(address).details: Master address to which the address is being linked need not be verified     link address can only accept the request made by a master address, but can't initiate a linking request

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

registerMasterAddress(address,bool).details: Multiple accounts can be linked to master address to act on behalf. Master address can be registered by multiple verifiers

params._isMasterLinked: boolean which specifies if the masterAddress has to be added as a linked address                        _isMasterLinked is used to support users who want to keep the master address as a cold wallet for security
params._masterAddress: address which is registered as verified

removeVerifier(address).details: Verifier can add master address or remove addresses added by it

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

requestAddressLinking(address).details: only master address can initiate linking of another address

params._linkedAddress: address which is to be linked

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unlinkAddress(address).details: a single address can be linked to only one master address

unregisterMasterAddress(address,address).details: unregistering master address doesn't affect linked addreses mapping to master address, though they would not be verified by this verifier anymore

params._verifier: verifier address from which master address is unregistered

params._activationDelay: updated value of activation delay for registered/linking addresses in seconds

activationDelay().notice: Delay in seconds after which addresses are activated once registered or linked

cancelAddressLinkingRequest(address).notice: Used by master address to cancel request linking another address to it

initialize(address,uint256).notice: Initializes the variables of the contract

isUser(address,address).notice: User to verify if an address is linked to a master address that is registered with verifier

linkAddress(address).notice: Link an address with a master address

linkedAddresses(address).notice: Maps linkedAddresses with the master address and activation time

masterAddresses(address,address).notice: Maps masterAddress with the verifier that was used to verify it and the time when master address is active

pendingLinkAddresses(address,address).notice: Maps address to link with the master addres

registerMasterAddress(address,bool).notice: Only verifier can add register master address

requestAddressLinking(address).notice: Used by master address to request linking another address to it

unregisterMasterAddress(address,address).notice: Master address can be unregistered by registered verifier or owner

verifiers(address).notice: Tells whether a given verifier is valid

documentation.text: @notice Delay in seconds after which addresses are activated once registered or linked
@notice Prevents anyone other than a valid verifier from calling a function

@notice Used by master address to cancel request linking another address to it
 @param  _linkedAddress address which is to be linked

@notice owner can update activation delay
 @param _activationDelay updated value of activation delay for registered/linking addresses in seconds
@title Contract that handles linking identity of user to address
